contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 4th day of October 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal in the above captioned matter is GRANTED, limited to the following issue:
Whether 42 Pa.C.S.A. § 5104(b) and Article I, Section 6 of the Pennsylvania Constitution require that the same ten jurors must vote the same on each question listed on a special interrogatory verdict sheet for there to be a “verdict”?
